title: Facebook photo of ‘strange aquatic creature’ not from Kenya
subtitle: A photo of a
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
washed ashore has got much attention on Kenyan Facebook. The fish has

The caption reads: “This strange aquatic creature was found in a dam between Kericho and Bomet.”

But background details hint that the caption may not be true. The fish lies on white sand common on coastal beaches, not on the shores of Kenya’s inland dams.

Photo most likely from Thailand

credits the image to Roman Fedortsov, a Russian deep-sea fisherman. A look at his

His “crazy” deep-sea discoveries have been reported on

Africa Check contacted Fedortsov about the photo. He said a friend snapped it on Thailand’s Phuket island. He

the second on 12 November 2018, saying it was from Layan Beach on the west coast of Phuket.

Those were the two images

with the claim the fish was from a dam between Bomet and Kericho.
